name: Josh Hartnett
description: American actor known for his roles in films like 'Pearl Harbor' and 'Black Hawk Down'.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Josh Hartnett was born in 1978 in Saint Paul, Minnesota, USA. He gained prominence in the late 1990s with roles in teen films and enjoyed a successful career in the early 2000s with prominent roles in major Hollywood films.

content.title: Career
content.body: Hartnett's breakout role came in 1998 with the horror film **Halloween H20: 20 Years Later**. He then starred in notable films such as **Pearl Harbor** and **Black Hawk Down**. Known for his versatility, Hartnett has taken on a variety of roles in different genres. He briefly stepped away from mainstream Hollywood, exploring independent and international projects.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body:
- **Michael Bay**: Director of 'Pearl Harbor'
- **Ridley Scott**: Director of 'Black Hawk Down'

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Although Hartnett stepped back from the Hollywood spotlight, his work in the early 2000s left a significant impact. He was regarded as one of the promising young actors of his generation and continues to be involved in diverse projects.
